text.author: Dr. Cellini
text.title: WEEK IN MY LIFE: DOCTOR - HOSPITAL VLOG
text.summary: A radiology resident vlogging on YouTube tells about his week on general nuclear medicine rotation, where he did three lymphoscintigraphies and some ultrasounds, his plans to work out after he gets off early from work, and taking Dutch cough drops to treat his sore throat ahead of a big trip he is planning the following weekend.
